members.name: BeforeInstallPromptEvent.platforms
members.description: Returns an array of DOMString items containing the platforms on which the event was dispatched. This is provided for user agents that want to present a choice of versions to the user such as, for example, "web" or "play" which would allow the user to chose between a web version or an Android version.

members.name: BeforeInstallPromptEvent.userChoice
members.description: Returns a Promise that resolves to a DOMString containing either 'installed' or 'dismissed'.

members.name: BeforeInstallPromptEvent.prompt()
members.description: Allows a developer to show the install prompt at a time of their own choosing. This method returns a  Promise.
